mapper.select: select answerId, examId, stuId, quesType, quesId, answer,score,rightAnswer from cqc_exam.answer where examId=#{examid} and stuId = #{stuid}
select answerId, examId, stuId, quesType, quesId, answer,score,rightAnswer from cqc_exam.answer where answerId = #{answerid}
select answerId, examId, stuId, quesType, quesId, answer,score,rightAnswer from cqc_exam.answer where quesType = #{questype} and quesId=#{quesid} and stuId=#{stuid} and examId=#{examid}
select answerId, examId, stuId, quesType, quesId, answer,score,rightAnswer from cqc_exam.answer limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into cqc_exam.answer(examId, stuId, quesType, quesId, answer,score,rightAnswer) values (#{examid}, #{stuid}, #{questype}, #{quesid}, #{answer},#{score},#{rightAnswer})
mapper.update:
